results.title: An East Village Boutique Where the Avant-Garde Gathered

results.title: ‘Squid Game’ Has Made Tracksuits Hot
results.abstract: The dystopian Netflix hit from South Korea is proving an unexpected style influence. Here’s why.

multimedia.caption: The characters in “Squid Game” don matching teal-green tracksuits as they are forced to play children’s games to the death to pay off their debts.
multimedia.copyright: Netflix

results.title: The Hand-Beaded Chanel Bag That Takes 120 Hours to Embroider
results.abstract: For the latest iteration of its 11.12 pocketbook, the house drew inspiration from its founder’s favorite flower, and from the savoir-faire of its artisans.

multimedia.caption: At a Chanel factory in the French village of Verneuil-en-Halatte, the latest iteration of the classic flap bag waits to be adorned with a shoulder strap. The hand-embroidered lambskin panels take about 120 hours per bag to complete.
multimedia.copyright: Matthew Avignone

results.title: The End of Gender
results.abstract: Has fashion bid the binary goodbye?
results.byline: By Vanessa Friedman and Guy Trebay

multimedia.caption: Backstage at Lanvin. Classically “girlie” clothes in bright colors, soft fabrics and lots of decoration were worn by both women and men.
multimedia.copyright: Valerio Mezzanotti for The New York Times
